title: MechanicalCalibration
description: This describes the procedures that were used for mechanical calibration and the resulting calibration results.

subCategoriesOrder.MechanicalCalibration: This describes the procedures that were used for mechanical calibration and the resulting calibration results.
subCategoriesOrder.SamplePositioning: This empty element refers to the Sample Positioning device that was used for the Acquisition of the experimental Image this Mechanical Calibration procedure refers to.
subCategoriesOrder.FocusStabilization: This empty element refers to the optional Focus Stabilization Device that was used for the Acquisition of the experimental Image this Mechanical Calibration procedure refers to.

ID.description: A Unique Identifier for this component.

Date.description: Ths field records the Date in which this Calibration procedure was performed.

MeasuredXReproducibility.description: This field captures the observed Precision with which this Instrument is capable of maintaining a given X-axis position over time during Image Acquisition and as measured by this Mechanical Calibration procedure. This metric is generally referred to as Reproducibility and it might also be referred to as X Lateral Drift. This metric is particularly relevant for Stereology systems and for the calibration of Sample Positioning devices.

MeasuredYReproducibility.description: This field captures the observed Precision with which this Instrument is capable of maintaining a given Y-axis position over time during Image Acquisition and as measured by this Mechanical Calibration procedure. This metric is generally referred to as Reproducibility and it might also be referred to as Y Lateral Drift. This metric is particularly relevant for Stereology systems and for the calibration of Sample Positioning devices.

MeasuredFocalReproducibility.description: This field captures the observed Precision with which this Instrument is capable of maintaining a given Z-axis position over time during Image Acquisition and as measured by this Mechanical Calibration procedure. This metric is generally referred to as Reproducibility and it might also be referred to as Focal Drift. This metric is particularly relevant for Stereology systems and for the calibration of Sample Positioning devices.

MeasuredXRepeatability.description: This field captures the observed X-axis Accuracy with which this Instrument is capable of returning to a previously visited position during Image Acquisition and as measured by this Mechanical Calibration Procedure. This metric is important for example for Tiling.

MeasuredYRepeatability.description: This field captures the observed Y-axis Accuracy with which this Instrument is capable of returning to a previously visited position during Image Acquisition and as measured by this Mechanical Calibration Procedure. This metric is important for example for Tiling.

MeasuredFocalRepeatability.description: This field captures the observed Z-axis Accuracy with which this Instrument is capable of returning to a previously visited position during Image Acquisition and as measured by this Mechanical Calibration Procedure. This metric is important for example for Tiling.

MeasuredXSettlingTime.description: This field captures the observed Time it takes for this Instrument to stabilize at the target X-axis position during Image Acquisition and as measured by this Mechanical Calibration Procedure.

MeasuredYSettlingTime.description: This field captures the observed Time it takes for this Instrument to stabilize at the target Y-axis position during Image Acquisition and as measured by this Mechanical Calibration Procedure.

MeasuredFocalSettlingTime.description: This field captures the observed Time it takes for this Instrument to stabilize at the target Z-axis position during Image Acquisition and as measured by this Mechanical Calibration Procedure.

MeasuredXReproducibility_SD.description: This field captures the Standard Deviation associated with the observed Precision with which this Instrument is capable of maintaining a given X-axis position over time during Image Acquisition and as measured by this Mechanical Calibration procedure.

MeasuredYReproducibility_SD.description: This field captures the Standard Deviation associated with the observed Precision with which this Instrument is capable of maintaining a given Y-axis position over time during Image Acquisition and as measured by this Mechanical Calibration procedure.

MeasuredFocalReproducibility_SD.description: This field captures the Standard Deviation associated with the observed Precision with which this Instrument is capable of maintaining a given Z-axis position over time during Image Acquisition and as measured by this Mechanical Calibration procedure.

MeasuredXRepeatability_SD.description: This field captures the Standard Deviation associated with the observed X-axis Accuracy with which this Instrument is capable of returning to a previously visited position (useful for tiling) during Image Acquisition and as measured by this Mechanical Calibration Procedure.

MeasuredYRepeatability_SD.description: This field captures the Standard Deviation associated with the observed Y-axis Accuracy with which this Instrument is capable of returning to a previously visited position (useful for tiling) during Image Acquisition and as measured by this Mechanical Calibration Procedure.

MeasuredFocalRepeatability_SD.description: This field captures the Standard Deviation associated with the observed Z-axis Accuracy with which this Instrument is capable of returning to a previously visited position (useful for tiling) during Image Acquisition and as measured by this Mechanical Calibration Procedure.

MeasuredXSettlingTime_SD.description: This field captures the Standard Deviation associated with the observed Time it takes for this Instrument to stabilize at the target X-axis position during Image Acquisition and as measured by this Mechanical Calibration Procedure.

MeasuredYSettlingTime_SD.description: This field captures the Standard Deviation associated with the observed Time it takes for this Instrument to stabilize at the target Y-axis position during Image Acquisition and as measured by this Mechanical Calibration Procedure.

MeasuredFocalSettlingTime_SD.description: This field captures the Standard Deviation associated with the observed Time it takes for this Instrument to stabilize at the target Z-axis position during Image Acquisition and as measured by this Mechanical Calibration Procedure.

SamplePositioning.description: This empty element refers to the Sample Positioning device that was used for the Acquisition of the experimental Image this Mechanical Calibration procedure refers to.

FocusStabilization.description: This empty element refers to the optional Focus Stabilization Device that was used for the Acquisition of the experimental Image this Mechanical Calibration procedure refers to.

Description.title: Description
Description.description: This is a simple multi-line comment or annotation describing this component.

Tier.description: The tier level of this component.
